* The battle was getting better but still the CF was taking heavy damage. 
And from a past inkling from Prowl's mind, it wouldn't really matter.
But then a sudden explosion of firing caught IR by surprise, located at the 
north end of the CF. Scanning she discovered Hell Beast.
< Filthy scum. > She hissed to herself.
It was then that she wished she could transform into her SBM but then that 
would trigger Prowl to do the same and the last thing they nedded was an 
uncontrolable beast.
But...then again....
SBM: < So, finally need me now?>
< Shut up and transform!>
SBM: < You're the boss.>
The transformation wasn't as easy as it had been the first time, though the 
last one had more pain involved then this.
It only took a matter of seconds before IR had completed the morph from bot 
to beast, but she had a plan up her sleeve.
Before she had TFed she gave Prowl an image of 4 explicit signatures that 
were soaring 200 meters above the CF, trying to lock that image into his 
mind so that, IF he TFed then he would have those targets to destroy while 
she went after those of Hell Beasts force which were on the ground.( 
Gremlin,Pheniox, Aerostreak, and Craken.)
By then she was already 3/4 of the way to the location of the enemy which 
was firing on her ship, growling when she finally saw Hell Beast himself. 
But before she even could approach him alone, there were his troops on the 
southern face she had to deal with first. Jackle, Klash, Nighteyes and 
Marine.
If she had to she would deal with one group at a time, but they would have 
to notice her or be destroyed, it was their choice.
Iron,roared as she beared down on that group, each step carrying her closer 
to striking range.*
